price: 26. Sii kan qaraabada ah (iyo deriska) xaqiisa iyo miskiinka iyo musaafirka (go’doonsan), hana ku bixinnina maalka wax xun oo dayac ah11.
arabic: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَبۡذِيرًا
footnotes: 11.Macnaha waa ha ku bixin wax xaaraan ah ama kuu caasiyoobid Alle.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waāti dhā al-qur'bā ḥaqqahu wal-mis'kīna wa-ib'na al-sabīli walā tubadhir tabdhīran
